content: **sizes ** bev s really basic stretchy hat - in 7 sizes 3-5 lb preemie infant/baby toddler 1-3 years old child 4-9 years tweens teen-adult lg mens **materials required ** 3 oz of bright colored worsted weight 4 ply yarn size 8 knitting needles - can be made using circular needles too this hat can be made in many sizes one to fit everyone you know easy to knit and a great pattern for beginners as all you need to know is how to cast one knit purl knitting stitches together and casting off make a bunch in bright colors for the ones you love this winter and a couple more for shelters in your area
